name: Yamsylvania (LD52)
description:
Welcome to Yamsylvania!

The backbone of the world’s Yam economy, Yamsylvania has been overrun by a horde of Yampires and Yampire Bats. But the show must go on! You’re a dedicated farmer and you’ve decided you’ll continue to sell yams despite the challenge. Your wife, Yamela, has taken the kids to safety. It’s just you and the yams now. Good luck!

Each time you play, you’ll enter one of three designed levels at random. Sell as many yams as you can before you get overrun. Here’s the catch - the yams are also your only defense. Throw yams at the horde to thin it out. Your career stats are available on the main menu.

Note: Not all harvests are created equal. Ripe plots will yield a varying amount of yams.

Created for Ludum Dare 52.
